short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Asymmetric encrypted chat plugin with integrated Web3 wallet identity and NFT tokens integrated to opensea.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seer chat: Web3 wallet with NFT tokens and a chat with the following functionality:
	1.	Asymmetric encrypted chat plugin
	2.	Integrate the identity of web3
	3.	Integrate currencies and assets on the ETH chain
	4.	Integrate ERC-721 NFTs
	5.	Integrate POAP under ETH (edited)
